entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge is mentioned as the headmaster who is being threatened and blackmailed by Malfoy. He is described as having a temper that will lead him into trouble one of these days.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as having a temper and shouting at the Azkaban guards. He is also mentioned as being against Dumbledore's removal.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who will not be removed by the governors. He is described as having bright blue eyes that are locked on Lucius Malfoy's cold grey ones.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who is blackmailing and threatening Cornelius Fudge. He is also described as having a cold grey gaze that Dumbledore locks onto.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is mentioned as the boarhound that cowers and whimpers in his basket when Hagrid yells.

entities.name: azkaban guards
entities.description: The Azkaban guards are mentioned as people who will not like it if Hagrid shouts at them.

entities.name: muggle-borns
entities.description: Muggle-borns are mentioned as a group of people who will stand no chance if Dumbledore is removed.

relationships.description: Hagrid threatens Malfoy, saying 'Yeh can't take Dumbledore!' and making Fang cower in his basket.
Dumbledore locks his bright blue eyes onto Lucius Malfoy's cold grey ones, indicating a tense and confrontational relationship between the two.
Hagrid supports Dumbledore by saying 'Yeh can't take him away' and warning of killings if he is removed.
